SqlExecError:
(duckdb.duckdb.OutOfRangeException) Out of Range Error: input value inf is out of range for numeric function
[SQL: SELECT SIN(1e1000); -- -nan]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/9h9h)

TransferResult.Explanation: The DuckDB statement calculates the sine of a very large number (1e1000), which results in -nan (not a number). In MongoDB, we can achieve similar functionality by using the Math.sin function within a query. The translation maintains the column name 'value' and adheres to the requirement of not introducing meaningless features or random return values. The use of $eq ensures that we are looking for an exact match of the calculated sine value.
